name: Friends DVD Set
description: A collection of the full series of the show, Friends. This humorous classic is sure to put a smile on any viewer's face!

name: A Party Host's Cookbook
description: This cookbook featuring the delicious southern-inspired recipes for modern parties is sure to keep all of your social guests happy! This book is perfect for the person in your life that is always first to invite people over for the holidays and special occasions!

name: Insulated Water Bottle
description: This water bottle from Camelbak is the hydration buddy you have been looking for. It will keep you beverages hot or cold for hours, because it is insulated! This is perfect for anyone in your life who enjoys exploring the outdoors or excersizing!
